metadata.title: CVE-2016-8660 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: The XFS subsystem in the Linux kernel through 4.8.2 allows local users tocause a denial of service (fdatasync failure and system hang) by using thevfs syscall group in the trinity program, related to a "page lock order bugin the XFS seek hole/data implementation."

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').
linux-azure package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').

linux-raspi package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needed').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
